title: PREVIEW: Huskies head into stretch run - michigantechhuskies.com
content: PREVIEW: Huskies head into stretch run  michigantechhuskies.com
description: The Huskies continued to roll last week with a pair of road victories to extend their overall win streak to seven with four games left in the regular season. This week, Michigan Tech hosts Saginaw Valley State (17-7, 11-5) Thursday night at 7:30, followed by Wayne State (5-14, 4-12) Saturday at 2 p.m. on Senior Day.Â
